message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I really need to make a profit on this one. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit much for me. How about $115?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I really need to get at least $165 for it. Can you meet me at $140?
